about_the_game:
VR and Non-VR Cross-Play

Built from the ground up for both VR and Non-VR. We don’t discriminate. Controller support too!

Invite your Friends or Fly Solo

Have up to 6 players in a party. Play against bots, party members, or other players online.

Weapons

Collect a range of both useful and ridiculous weapons including a box of bees and bird blades. Enjoy an unlimited amount of trusty spike balls!

Abilities

Character abilities will help you take down enemies. Dash across the map, fire a homing missile, or freeze players in place.

Danger!

Flash storms? Burning sun rays? Falling lava rocks? No problem.

Solo Challenges

Test yourself with challenges to improve those shooting and driving skills!
detailed_description:
VR and Non-VR Cross-Play

Built from the ground up for both VR and Non-VR. We don’t discriminate. Controller support too!

Invite your Friends or Fly Solo

Have up to 6 players in a party. Play against bots, party members, or other players online.

Weapons

Collect a range of both useful and ridiculous weapons including a box of bees and bird blades. Enjoy an unlimited amount of trusty spike balls!

Abilities

Character abilities will help you take down enemies. Dash across the map, fire a homing missile, or freeze players in place.

Danger!

Flash storms? Burning sun rays? Falling lava rocks? No problem.

Solo Challenges

Test yourself with challenges to improve those shooting and driving skills!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.x or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change during development.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.x or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements may change during development.

name: Balloonatics

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $9.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $9.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy Balloonatics Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements may change during development.

short_description: Pilot a weaponized basket while dodging enemy fire and collecting weapons and traps to take down your opponents. Invite your friends, shoot them down, avoid getting shot down.
